Articles.Content: I was just wondering what it is in th CFG file that means you can rescale the appearance of parts ..
I guess it would be scale in asset parameters thevegimobil, try that

Actually, scale only rescales the attach nodes

What you're looking for here is rescaleFactor, which is 1.25 by default. Changing this will scale the model and its colliders, as well as the nodes.

And since C7 just posted this: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/entry.php/168-Modders-Corner-Getting-Started-Modding-KSP

Sorry to bring this back up but increasing the rescale factor doesn't seem to work?

Maybe i'm just too stupid but it doesn't work on mods and on vanilla parts :/

Help?^^
Make sure that it is rescaleFactor with the lowercase r and the uppercase F or the game won't recognize it.
